name: Music Player
description: A Telegram Music Bot written in Python using Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls

API_ID.description: Telegram app id, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Telegram app hash, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your telegram bot token, get it from https://t.me/botfather

SESSION.description: Pyrogram session string, get it from https://replit.com/@AsmSafone/genStr

SUDOERS.description: ID of sudo users who have special access (separate multiple ids with space)

PREFIX.description: Bot commad prefix or handler (separate multiple prefix with space)

LANGUAGE.description: An available bot language (read the README.md for more info)

QUALITY.description: An available stream quality (read the README.md for more info)

STREAM_MODE.description: An stream mode like audio or video (read the README.md for more info)

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Change it to 'True' if you want to make /play commands only for admins

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: Spotify client id get it from https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Spotify client secret get it from https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications
